dependencies.description:
NCBI AMRFinderPlus: This software and the accompanying database identify
acquired antimicrobial resistance genes in bacterial protein and/or
assembled nucleotide sequences as well as known resistance-associated
point mutations for several taxa. With AMRFinderPlus we added select
members of additional classes of genes such as virulence factors,
biocide, heat, acid, and metal resistance genes.
dependencies.name: amrfinder

dependencies.description:
ARAGORN, a program to detect tRNA genes and tmRNA genes in nucleotide
sequences.
dependencies.name: aragorn

dependencies.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependencies.name: blast-plus

dependencies.description: Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information.
dependencies.name: circos

dependencies.description:
DIAMOND is a sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches,
designed for high performance analysis of big sequence data.
dependencies.name: diamond

dependencies.description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).
dependencies.name: hmmer

dependencies.description:
Infernal (INFERence of RNA ALignment) is for searching DNA sequence
databases for RNA structure and sequence similarities. It is an
implementation of a special case of profile stochastic context-free
grammars called covariance models (CMs).
dependencies.name: infernal

dependencies.description: Identification and analysis of CRISPR repeats.
dependencies.name: pilercr

dependencies.description: Fast, reliable protein-coding gene prediction for prokaryotic genomes.
dependencies.name: prodigal

dependencies.description:
A new kind of Progress Bar, with real-time throughput, ETA, and very
cool animations!
dependencies.name: py-alive-progress

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
DeepSig - Predictor of signal peptides in proteins based on deep
learning
dependencies.name: py-deepsig-biocomp

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
HMMER is a biological sequence analysis tool that uses profile hidden
Markov models to search for sequence homologs. HMMER3 is developed and
maintained by the Eddy/Rivas Laboratory at Harvard University. pyhmmer
is a Python package, implemented using the Cython language, that
provides bindings to HMMER3.
dependencies.name: py-pyhmmer

dependencies.description:
Cython bindings and Python interface to Prodigal, an ORF finder for
genomes and metagenomes
dependencies.name: py-pyrodigal

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description:
This small Python module provides a xopen function that works like the
built-in open function, but can also deal with compressed files.
Supported compression formats are gzip, bzip2 and xz. They are
automatically recognized by their file extensions .gz, .bz2 or .xz.
dependencies.name: py-xopen

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description: Seaching for tRNA genes in genomic sequence
dependencies.name: trnascan-se

description:
Bakta: rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs &
plasmids
name: py-bakta

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: builds with deepsig to predict signal peptides
variants.name: deepsig
